nodes.text: Inijic was a Hutt clan, or kajidic. Kossak Inijic Ar'durv was a notable member of this clan.

While the Inijic kajidic itself has never been mentioned, its existence is implied by the name of Kossak Inijic Ar'durv. According to Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, the cuirvas (or middle name) of a Hutt identified their clan.
